A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of those frustrating movies that teeters on the edge of greatness\, but never quite gets there. I enjoyed getting to know the characters and some of the smaller set pieces leading up to the finale. However\, I was ultimately just okay with the end and the movie as a whole. I expected just a touch more than it was. That would have been enough to push this over the top for me.
